creator: volx@usa.net
text:
Hi there,

There are two typos in jndi.tld file making it unusable (at least in WebLogic 
5.1):

339c339
<       <name>attributesSeparator</name>
---
>       <name>attributeSeparator</name>
402c402
<     <teiclass>org.apache.taglibs.jndi.ForEachAttrtibuteTEI</teiclass>
---
>     <teiclass>org.apache.taglibs.jndi.ForEachAttributeTEI</teiclass>

Regards,

V.

creator: glenn@apache.org
text:
Thanks for reporting this.  Both typos in the tld have been fixed.
This will be available in the next nightly build.
